tooltips.name: A descriptive name for this sync configuration
tooltips.lastChatwootCursor: Timestamp of the last processed Chat record. Only records modified after this time will be synced.
tooltips.lastEspocrmCursor: Timestamp of the last processed CRM record. Only records modified after this time will be synced.
tooltips.lastRunAt: When the sync workflow last executed
tooltips.lastRunDurationMs: How long the last sync took in milliseconds
tooltips.lastRunStatus: Result of the last sync run
tooltips.lastRunError: Error message if the last sync failed
tooltips.totalSyncedToEspocrm: Total records synced from Chat to CRM
tooltips.totalSyncedToChatwoot: Total records synced from CRM to Chat
tooltips.totalConflictsResolved: Total conflicts that were automatically resolved
tooltips.syncIntervalSeconds: How often to run the sync (minimum 5 seconds)
tooltips.conflictResolution: Strategy when both systems have changes: chat_wins, crm_wins, or most_recent timestamp
